page.title: 16RECREATION_LEISURE ACTIVITY
page.content: OUR SURVEY WAS OF THE{LEISURE {ACTIVITIES}ENJOYED BY 42 FAMILIES.THEY WERE GIVEN A CHOICE OF 11 ACTIVITIES AND SAID WHICH THEY PREFERRED. WE FOUND THAT MEN PARTICIPATED IN MORE ACTIVITIES,WITH THREE EXCEPTIONS, GARDENING,BINGO AND THEATRE.THE MEN'S FAVOURITE ACTIVITY WAS D.I.Y,WITH A MAXIMUM VOTE OF 42.THE LADIES FAVOURITE ACTIVITY WAS GARDENING WITH A VOTE OF 39. COMMENTS ABOUT WHAT THE ADULTS THEMSELVES GOT OUT OF THESE ACTIVITIES WERE SIMILAR.IT SEEMS THAT READING, GARDENING AND T.V.ALL RELAX YOU WELL, WHILST PARTICIPATION SPORTS PROVIDE ENJOYMENT AND NEW FRIENDS.WE DECIDED THAT THE REASON WOMEN DON'T TAKE PART IN MORE SPORT IS PROBABLY BECAUSE THEY'RE NOT AS COMPETITIVE AS MEN.
